channel.title: How do i make new player not members (dodian)
channel.description: ok im using dodian source and i know its prolly in player.java but i have switched that to members: 0 and it still wont work any 1 got something to tell me to help me out?

item.title: How do i make new player not members (dodian)
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

log onto

localhost/phpmyadmin.
go to the database
click runescape
click the little box thing on the left on uber3_players
find the char u want
clcik the paintrush
change the rights to whatever u want

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make new player not members (dodian)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

[quote=“iatchi1019, post:3, topic:153156”]no search for this is client.java

case 4: //root admin playerRights = 3; premium = true; break; case 6: //regular admin playerRights = 2; premium = true; break; case 13: //player moderator playerRights = 1; premium = true; break; case 7: //global mod playerRights = 1; premium = true; break; case 11: playerRights = 0; premium = true; break; default: playerRights = 0; premium = true; break; }
and change it to this

case 4: //root admin playerRights = 3; premium = true; break; case 6: //regular admin playerRights = 2; premium = true; break; case 13: //player moderator playerRights = 1; premium = true; break; case 7: //global mod playerRights = 1; premium = true; break; case 11: playerRights = 0; premium = false; break; default: playerRights = 0; premium = false; break; }[/quote]

If thats correct, its that i’m not familiar with dodian, cuz its gay.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make new player not members (dodian)
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

no search for this is client.java

case 4: //root admin playerRights = 3; premium = true; break; case 6: //regular admin playerRights = 2; premium = true; break; case 13: //player moderator playerRights = 1; premium = true; break; case 7: //global mod playerRights = 1; premium = true; break; case 11: playerRights = 0; premium = true; break; default: playerRights = 0; premium = true; break; }
and change it to this

case 4: //root admin playerRights = 3; premium = true; break; case 6: //regular admin playerRights = 2; premium = true; break; case 13: //player moderator playerRights = 1; premium = true; break; case 7: //global mod playerRights = 1; premium = true; break; case 11: playerRights = 0; premium = false; break; default: playerRights = 0; premium = false; break; }

item.title: How do i make new player not members (dodian)
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Search for this:

outStream.writeByteA(1);

In your initialize method. Change the 1 to a 0.

1 = memeber 0 = not member
